description.value:
You alert your allies to look for enemies and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} things in a stressful situation, coordinating their efforts so they can do so more efficiently. Until the beginning of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}. As your envoy level increases, increase the bonus to +3 at 7th level, +4 at 12th level, and +5 at 17th level.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.feat-effects.Item.E5oRUzuYh5rLlPzu]{Effect: Search High and Low!}

Lead by Example If you used two actions, Seek. Each of your allies within 100 feet who can sense you can also immediately Seek as a reaction.
